subject: Re: [junit] junit, dbunit and xmlunit
msgSnippet: Hi, I can t really speak for DBUnit since I ve never used it much. ... Don t extend XMLTestcase, use the static methods in XMLAssert or even use XMLUnit s
messageBody:
Hi,

I can't really speak for DBUnit since I've never used it much.

On Mon, 31 Mar 2008, Kamal <kamal2222ahmed@...> wrote:

> XMLUnit - XMLTestcase - public abstract class XMLTestCase extends
> junit.framework.TestCase implements XSLTConstants , public interface
> XSLTConstants extends XMLConstants

Don't extend XMLTestcase, use the static methods in XMLAssert or even
use XMLUnit's JUnit independent API.

Stefan
